title: Wish on a Shooting Star
alt: Congratulations to whoever wished for revenge on a forest near the Tunguska River, a 1980 Chevy Malibu in Peekskill NY, Alabama resident Ann Hodges, every building in Chelyabinsk with glass windows, and the non-avian dinosaurs.
transcript:
[A Venn diagram is shown:][The left circle is labeled "Things people wish for" and contains:]
Love
Money
Fame
Health
Power
Luck
Success[The right circle is labeled "Things shooting stars can cause" and contains:]
Radio noise
Dust and ionized gas in the upper atmosphere
Infrasound
Cool lights in the sky[The only item in the overlapping section is:]
Revenge
